title.rendered: Alitalia Airlines Office in Caracas, Venezuela

content.rendered:
Alitalia Airlines – Societa Aerea Italiana (Alitalia – Italian Air Company) was established in 1999(operating as Alitalia ), commenced operations in 1 January 2015.Alitalia Airlines headquartered at Fiumicino, Rome, Italy.Its main hub is Leonardo da Vinci-Fiumicino Airport, in Rome and a secondary is Milan Linate Airport, in Milan.
Alitalia Airlines Caracas, Venezuela Address:
Customer relations address: Alitalia Servicio Clientela – Edif Atlantic – Piso 5 – Avenida Andres Bello de los Palos Grandes Los Palos Grandes – Caracas – Venezuela

Phone:
Alitalia Airlines Venezuela Customer relation phone:

For web assistance, flight information, booking, reservation and more queries, contact

Alitalia airlines customer care number:

From Italy 89 20 10
From Abroad +39 06 65649

Alitalia airlines Venezuela Call center and Bookings: CALL CENTER
+58 212 312 5000
BOOKINGS
+58 212 312 6000

Email: customer.relationsVE@alitalia.it

Alitalia Airlines official website: https://www.alitalia.com/en_us

Alitalia Airlines Online Check-in: www.alitalia.com/online check-in

Check Alitalia Airlines schedule here: www.alitalia.com/flight schedule

Check Alitalia Airlines flight status here: www.alitalia.com/flight status

Alitalia Airlines Venezuela Lost and Found office contact

For lost & found items, please contact the number provided below:

Alitalia airlines Venezuela lost & found: NA

Alitalia Airlines Millemiglia member services

Club MilleMiglia

From Italy 89 20 10
From Abroad +39 06 65649

Ulisse Freccia Alata

From Italy: 06 65644
From abroad: +39 06 65644

Millemiglia Member Services Venezuela Phone: Tel: 0058 212 312 5000

Millemiglia Member Services Venezuela Fax: Fax: 0058 212 2083109

Alitalia Airlines Baggage Allowance

Alitalia Airlines Baggage

View Alitalia Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Travel during pregnancy in Alitalia Airlines

Pregnancy policy in Alitalia Airlines:

Expectant mothers can travel in Alitalia airlines till 36 th week of their pregnancy. Medical form is required after 27 th week of pregnancy. Download medical information form here

The pregnant woman must carry the certificate from a doctor (medical certificate) and obstetric/gynecologic record. For more details, visit here for the pregnancy rules in Alitalia airlines.

View the nearest Alitalia Airlines offices in Venezuela and the address, phone number, website and more.

List of Alitalia Airlines Offices around the world

View the Alitalia Airlines offices address, phone number, email through the above link.
